conbody.p: The Department of the Army, through the Office of the Deputy Assistant Secretary of the Army (Procurement), shall establish, execute, and provide oversight of a tiered PMR program reviewing each contracting activity every three years in order to â€“
(a) Assess, analyze, and communicate the health of Army contracting to senior Army leadership;
(b) Ensure management oversight and control of contracting related issues;
(c) Ensure compliance with Federal, Defense, and Army acquisition regulations and policies; and
(d) Provide best practices for the Army to enhance the procurement process.
